content:
/>
XIII.i.1.C.1.c
.
Determining Whether the Disability Was the Result of Willful Misconduct
A determination as to whether the disability was the result of willful misconduct is made by the rating activity or authorization activity according to the provisions of
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.C
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C - Ratings to Extend the Delimiting Date for Educational Assistance
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C
